Country Facts
Which country currently holds the largest population on Earth? China India United States Mexico
Which country is marked? Myanmar Cambodia China Laos
The official language of Angola is... Portuguese
What 3 facts are true about Germany? It\'s illegal to run out of fuel in the Autobahn. College education is free even for internationals. Fanta originated there as a result of the 2nd World War. Nudity is legal. Is the healthiest country in the world for diet.
What is the official name and language of the country marked? Chad - Arabic & French Myanmar - Burmese Belarus - Belarusian & Russian Turkey - Turkish
What 3 facts are true about Chad? It\'s official language is Arabic & French. People use Kakaki, a long metal trumpet, in traditional ceremonial music. Has one of the highest maternal mortality rates in the world. Most populous country in Africa. Home to Nollywood.
What\'s the name of the currency used in Cambodia? Riel
Tourist\'s most favourite country is... France Italy United States Mexico
Which 3 countries below are located in the Africa? Angola Mali Nigeria Cambodia Bhutan
The official language of Myanmar is... Burmese Dzongkha Kyrgyz Nepali â–¶bjg
